title: Master Past Passive Voice Usage
objectives: Understand Passive Voice Past at Beginner level
Apply Passive Voice Past in real conversations
Build confidence with Passive Voice Past

vocabulary.definition: Passive form in the past tense.
vocabulary.example: The movie was watched by many.

vocabulary.definition: Indicates the doer of the action.
Sentence structure emphasizing the action's recipient.
vocabulary.example: The cake was baked by Mom.

content.introduction: Welcome to this lesson on Passive Voice Past.
content.explanation: In this lesson, you will learn about Passive Voice Past at the Beginner level.
examples: Example of Passive Voice Past usage.
tips: Practice Passive Voice Past daily for best results.

exercises.question: Select the correct form: 'The report ____ prepared yesterday.'
Tell about a past event using passive voice.

culturalNote: American news reports frequently utilize past passive to describe events objectively, emphasizing actions over actors.
